```{r setup}
library(opengender)
```

```{r list-available}
# show available dictionaries
list_dict()
```

```{r show-dictionary}
show_dict("kantro")
```

```{r}
library(magrittr)

names_sample.df <- ssa_baby_names.df %>%
  dplyr::slice_sample(n=1000, replace=TRUE)

names_sample.df %<>% 
  dplyr::bind_rows(tibble::tibble(firstname=c("Wozzleface","Hanah")))
  
add_gender_predictions(names_sample.df, 
              dicts = "kantro",
              col_map=c(given = "firstname", year="", country="") ) -> res
res
```
